Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 and Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Clear cache for best performance. Utilize SSD for faster performance. This game contains flashes and visual effects that could trigger seizures. Please consult with your doctor before playing if you are prone to seizures or epilepsy. STEAM DECK: To play on Steam Deck, select the game > settings > properties > compatibility > force use + Proton 9.0. Next, select the Deck right menu > Performance > Use per-game profile > Disable Frame Limit
